subject: Re: [junit] How to test using XML and XSLT?
msgSnippet: ... XSLT Unit (use Google to find it/them). Or examine the output XML with some Xpaths (AssertXPath() would a good extension for junit addons if it s not there
messageBody:
uweanimal wrote:

> I have a program which takes a XML input file and runs it through an
> XSLT process.
>
> What is the best way to test that this has been achieved sucessfully?

XSLT Unit (use Google to find it/them). Or examine the output XML
with some Xpaths

(AssertXPath() would a good extension for junit addons if it's not
there already)

Bill de hÓra
